title: Stardust Angel

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Cover someone in stardust each night.
-Once per game, cover all of your visitors in stardust.
Attributes:
-If someone covered in stardust attacks a target, grant the target Powerful defense.
-Stardust lasts only for the night (meaning the next night they're no longer covered in stardust unless you cover them again)
-You will not know if you healed anybody.

desc:
Post 47
*"Blow the trumpet! The time has come to fight!"*
